article.title: Welcome to the Connecticut U.S. Export Assistance Center
article.summary: Learn more about the Connecticut U.S. Export Assistance Center.
article.content:
​​​

Trade Mission in Toronto: District Director of the U.S. Department of Commerce Anne Evans speaks at the event that features the very best tastes and sights of Connecticut.

Our Mission

Global Markets assists and advocates for U.S. businesses in international markets to foster U.S. economic prosperity.

Utilizing our network of trade promotion and policy professionals located in over 70 countries and 100 U.S. locations, Global Markets promotes U.S. exports, especially among small and medium-sized enterprises; advances and protects U.S. commercial interests overseas; and attracts inward investment into the United States.

Our Vision

Global markets provides the most effective and efficient government assistance to U.S. businesses, foreign investors in the United States, and partners seeking opportunities and facing challenges in a dynamic global marketplace.

For more information on how our staff of International Trade Specialists can help your company reach its international goals,take alook at our services section.​

article.seometadatadescription: Learn more about the Connecticut U.S. Export Assistance Center.
